TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RoleManagerSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class RoleManagerSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 定义用于支持 Web 应用程序的角色管理基础结构的配置设置。

span.span: Defines configuration settings that are used to support the role management infrastructure of Web applications.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使您能够以编程方式访问和修改的内容`roleManager`配置文件节。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the content of the `roleManager` section of the configuration file. ## Examples 本部分提供两个代码示例。This section provides two code examples. 第一个示例演示如何以声明方式指定的多个属性的值类。The first demonstrates how to declaratively specify values for several properties of the class. 第二个演示如何使用类型。The second demonstrates how to use the type. 下面的配置文件示例演示如何以声明方式指定的多个属性的值类。The following configuration file example shows how to declaratively specify values for several properties of the class. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类型。The following code example demonstrates how to use the type. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/CS/rolemanagersection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/VB/rolemanagersection.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用默认设置初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using default settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它是由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用的。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 获取实例类通过方法。You obtain an instance of the class by using the method. 下表显示的默认设置的用于构造函数。The following table shows the default settings that are used for the constructor. |PropertyProperty|默认值Default value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||".ASPXROLES"".ASPXROLES"| ||"/""/"| ||`All`| ||`false`| ||`true`| ||30，以分钟为单位30, in minutes| ||`false`| ||"AspNetSqlRoleProvider""AspNetSqlRoleProvider"| ||空字符串 ("")An empty string ("")| ||2525|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CacheRolesInCookie { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CacheRolesInCookie : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当前用户的角色是否已缓存在某个 Cookie 中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current user's roles are cached in a cookie.

value.span: 如果当前用户的角色已缓存在某个 Cookie 中，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if the current user's roles are cached in a cookie; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回一个布尔值，该值指示是否启用角色名称的 cookie 存储。The property returns a Boolean value indicating whether cookie storage for role names is enabled. 当属性设置为`true`在配置文件中，每个用户角色信息存储在客户端上的 cookie。When the property is set to `true` in the configuration file, role information for each user is stored in a cookie on the client. 当角色管理检查以确定用户是否对特定角色中时，将调用以检查角色的数据源列表的角色提供程序之前先检查角色 cookie。When role management checks to determine whether a user is in a particular role, the roles cookie is checked before calling the role provider to check the list of roles at the data source. 最近已验证的角色名称缓存在客户端上，动态更新 cookie。The cookie is dynamically updated on the client to cache the most recently validated role names. 你可以提高通过指定缓存在 cookie 中的角色名称的可靠性属性配置时`roleManager`配置文件节。You can improve the reliability of the role names that are cached in a cookie by specifying a property when you configure the `roleManager` section of the configuration file. 默认值属性是`All`，该加密 cookie 中的角色名称和验证的 cookie 内容没有已改变。The default property is `All`, which encrypts role names in the cookie and validates that the cookie contents have not been altered. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/CS/rolemanagersection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/VB/rolemanagersection.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CookieName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.CookieName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于缓存角色名称的 Cookie 的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the cookie that is used to cache role names.

value.span: 用于缓存角色名称的 Cookie 的名称。

span.span: The name of the cookie used to cache role names.

value.span: 默认值是“.ASPXROLES”。

span.span: The default is ".ASPXROLES".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性将返回缓存角色名称使用 cookie 的名称。The property returns the name of the cookie that is used to cache role names. 你可以为你的应用程序指定在其中缓存角色 cookie 的名称，通过设置`cookieName`ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中的属性。You can specify the name of the cookie where roles are cached for your application by setting the `cookieName` attribute in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application. 当你想要唯一标识你的应用程序的 cookie 或 cookie 共享跨多个应用程序时，这非常有用。This is useful when you want to uniquely identify a cookie for your application or when a cookie is shared across multiple applications. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/CS/rolemanagersection.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/VB/rolemanagersection.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CookiePath { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.CookiePath : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于缓存角色名称的 Cookie 的虚拟路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the virtual path of the cookie that is used to cache role names.

value.span: 用于存储角色名称的 Cookie 的路径。

span.span: The path of the cookie used to store role names.

value.span: 默认值是“/”。

span.span: The default is "/".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以通过设置指定你的应用程序在其中缓存角色名称 cookie 的路径`cookiePath`ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中的属性。You can specify the path of the cookie where role names are cached for your application by setting the `cookiePath` attribute in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application. 属性返回的值`cookiePath`从 Web.config 文件的属性。The property returns the value of the `cookiePath` attribute from the Web.config file. 该路径是区分大小写。The path is case sensitive. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/CS/rolemanagersection.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/VB/rolemanagersection.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Security::CookieProtection CookieProtection { System::Web::Security::CookieProtection get(); void set(System::Web::Security::CookieProtection value); };
member this.CookieProtection : System.Web.Security.CookieProtection with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于保护缓存角色名称的 Cookie 的安全类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of security that is used to protect the cookie that caches role names.

value.span: 在缓存角色名称的 Cookie 中使用的安全保护类型。

span.span: The type of security protection used within the cookie where role names are cached.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性描述如何安全地存储在 cookie 中的信息。The property describes how information in a cookie is securely stored. 可以通过设置你的应用程序中指定其中缓存角色的 cookie 的安全类型`cookieProtection`ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中的属性。You can specify the security type of the cookie where roles are cached for your application by setting the `cookieProtection` attribute in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application. `cookieProtection`属性采用的枚举值`All`， `Encryption`， `None`，或`Validation`。The `cookieProtection` attribute takes a enumeration value of `All`, `Encryption`, `None`, or `Validation`. 默认值为 `All`。The default is `All`. 请务必使用的默认值为属性，如果您希望数据验证和加密帮助保护 cookie。Be sure to use the default value for the property if you want both data validation and encryption to help protect the cookie. 若要提高你 cookie 的保护，你还可以设置属性`true`。To improve the protection of your cookie, you can also set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/CS/rolemanagersection.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/VB/rolemanagersection.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CookieRequireSSL { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CookieRequireSSL : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用于缓存角色名称的 Cookie 是否需要一个安全套接字层 (SSL) 连接才能被返回到服务器。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cookie that is used to cache role names requires a Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) connection in order to be returned to the server.

value.span: 如果需要一个 SSL 连接才能将缓存角色名称的 Cookie 返回到服务器，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if an SSL connection is needed in order to return to the server the cookie where role names are cached; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以指定是否需要 SSL 才能通过设置返回到服务器的角色名称 cookie `cookieRequireSSL` ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中的属性。You can specify whether SSL is required to return the role names cookie to the server by setting the `cookieRequireSSL` attribute in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/CS/rolemanagersection.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/VB/rolemanagersection.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CookieSlidingExpiration { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CookieSlidingExpiration : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否定期重置用于缓存角色名称的 Cookie。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cookie that is used to cache role names will be reset periodically.

value.span: 如果将要定期重置角色名称 Cookie 的到期日期和时间，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if the role names cookie expiration date and time will be reset periodically; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以指定是否使用缓存角色名称 cookie 是定期重置或使用过期时间在固定点`cookieSlidingExpiration`ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中的属性。You can specify whether the cookie that is used to cache role names is periodically reset or expired at a fixed point in time by using the `cookieSlidingExpiration` attribute in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application. 如果`true`，cookie 到期时间最初设置为当前日期和时间加上属性，以分钟为单位。If `true`, the cookie expiration is initially set to the current date and time plus the property, in minutes. 虽然用户可以继续主动使用 ASP.NET 应用程序的到期日期和时间的 cookie 自动刷新时，如果没有少于一半的剩余。While the user continues to actively use the ASP.NET application, the expiration date and time of the cookie is automatically refreshed, if there is less than half of the remaining. 默认值为 `true`。The default is `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/CS/rolemanagersection.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/VB/rolemanagersection.vb#7)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于缓存角色名称的 Cookie 过期之前的分钟数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of minutes before the cookie that is used to cache role names expires.

value.span: ，这是用于缓存角色名称的 Cookie 过期之前的分钟数。

span.span: A that is the number of minutes before the cookie used to cache role names expires.

value.span: 默认值为 30（以分钟为单位）。

span.span: The default is 30, in minutes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置指定的角色名称 cookie 到期前的分钟数的值。The property sets a value specifying the number of minutes before the role names cookie expires. 默认值为 30 分钟。The default is 30 minutes. 如果属性是`false`、忽略属性。If the property is `false`, the property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. member this.CreatePersistentCookie : bool with get, set

summary.span: 指示是使用基于会话的 Cookie 还是使用持久性 Cookie 来缓存角色名称。

span.span: Indicates whether a session-based cookie or a persistent cookie is used to cache role names.

value.span: 若要使角色名称 Cookie 在浏览器会话之间得到保持，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: to make the role names cookie persistent across browser sessions; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否使用缓存角色名称 cookie 应基于会话的 cookie，这意味着，cookie 会丢失，关闭浏览器时或永久 cookie，这意味着，cookie 可跨浏览器会话。The property indicates whether or not the cookie that is used to cache role names should be a session-based cookie, which means that the cookie is lost when the browser is closed, or a persistent cookie, which means that the cookie is available across browser sessions. 默认值是`false`，指示基于会话的 cookie 用于缓存角色名称。The default is `false`, which indicates that a session-based cookie is used to cache role names. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. value.span: 中的提供程序的名称。

span.span: The name of a provider in the .

value.span: 默认值是“AspNetSqlRoleProvider”。

span.span: The default is "AspNetSqlRoleProvider".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性中指定的值必须匹配`providers`的小节`roleManager`配置文件节。The property must match a named value in the `providers` subsection of the `roleManager` section of a configuration file. 空字符串 ("") 不是有效的值为属性。An empty string ("") is not a valid value for the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ()。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置中设置属性`domain`属性`roleManager`配置元素。The property is set in the configuration for an ASP.NET application by using the `domain` attribute of the `roleManager` configuration element. 如果配置中不指定任何值`domain`属性，属性返回`null`的角色名称 cookie 域默认为的行为和属性。If no value is specified in the configuration for the `domain` attribute, the property returns `null` and the role names cookie domain defaults to the behavior of the property. 默认值为一个空字符串。The default is an empty string.

Public ReadOnly Property Providers As ProviderSettingsCollection

summary.span: 获取 元素的 对象。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 角色管理提供程序是提供对站点的类型的角色访问的组件。Role management providers are components that provide access to the types of roles for a site. 你可以指定角色中的管理提供程序`providers`的小节`roleManager`配置文件节。You can specify role management providers in the `providers` subsection of the `roleManager` section of a configuration file. 属性指定默认情况下使用的提供程序。The property specifies the provider that is used by default. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/CS/rolemanagersection.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/VB/rolemanagersection.vb#13)]
